alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:02PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard County through 745 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm from Port Saint John to Cape Canaveral, moving northeast at 15 mph. Additional strong storms will move northeast toward the barrier islands through 745 pm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Titusville, Rockledge and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
